Description: Support door weight properly to prevent damage to hinges
Preventive_Action: Use proper lifting equipment and techniques

Description: Recalibrate CAOS sensors after any door adjustment
Keep seal areas clean and free from contamination
Preventive_Action: Clean with approved solvent before installation

Description: Use calibrated torque wrench for all fasteners
Preventive_Action: Verify torque wrench calibration before use

Description: Use only approved lubricants on door mechanisms
Perform leak test after any seal work
Update CAOS digital twin after maintenance
Protect door components from extreme temperatures during storage
Preventive_Action: Store in climate-controlled area per specs

Description: Follow procedure steps in exact order
Preventive_Action: Do not skip or reorder steps

Description: Inspect adjacent components when replacing seals
Ensure CAOS software is current version before diagnostics
Preventive_Action: Check version and update if required

Description: Minimum two technicians required for door removal
Preventive_Action: Do not attempt single-person door removal
